blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs version 2.3.27
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded a new version of DeeEnEs (2.3.27) to fix a tiny bug which causes mayor problems. Due to a bug that has existed for some time some older versions of DeeEnEs have effectively started a DDOS attack on my website (laugh all you want, 10GB of traffic each week is not funny! Ok ok, so it is funny, but it is still a big problem that has to be solved). So everybody please upgrade now!
